where we tell them things they really don't wanna hear.
So I think if they are "satisfied,"
then that means we're doing something wrong,
or we're asking the wrong questions.

More honest questions means more honest answers.

If we're not improving, we're failing.

And for you.

But that's where you're wrong.
I haven't had months of chemo
because I've been throwing
your stupid pills in the garbage.
Straight into the trash.
Against his wife's wishes.
Okay, hold on, you have been throwing away your chemo pills?
They made me feel sick, so I stopped taking 'em.
And now? I'm not sick.
You doctors, acting so fancy.
You have no clue.
Just a bunch of puppets for Big Pharma.
Mr. Levin, Mr. Levin...
Yeah, save it for the next sucker.
Come on, Louise.
Mm-mm. Rise up!

Bob!
Olivette, I know you don't want to harm your baby.

Uh...
I haven't gone to any.
You're afraid you'd be judged?

Okay, so you intended to keep the baby.
Yes.
The baby was gonna be my new chapter.

Like the best mom, you know?
But...
Then you went back out.
About a week ago.
First time in months.
Okay, so what changed?
Didn't need anything to change.
It's what I do.

No family, friends?
Any support?
None out here.
Olivette, you slipped.
It happens. That's all.
Nah, that ain't the end of it.
I'm gonna keep using, I know it.
And when was the last time that you felt the baby kick?
Any movement?
I don't know, a few days ago.
Maybe.

Is that true or not?
Technically, yes, uh,
the baby can survive at six months.

I need it out.
Avi.
Hiya's stable.

Yes.

there are parts of Bob

Tell me about it.

You can ask Nurse Colleen. She's available.
Yes, yes, thank you, thank you, thank you.
Somebody having a mid-life crisis down here?

Yes.

Avi.

Avi...
look, this isn't gonna be easy for you to hear,

Better for the patients?

You were there?

Why?
You're right.
Do what you have to do.
Thank you.
All right, are you sure that this is everything

Yes.

Ben has a perfect view.

Sue me.
Dr. Wilder, is that drug the reason

For the record, I'm not on Viagra.

they rebranded it.
My point here is that sometimes,

It's not all about you.

Uh...
